description: A retired elderly man lodging at the Gochiso apartments; room 201. He harbours an obsessive ephebophilic interest in Kuzuha Fuuko, shown by his photograph collection littered on his apartment walls. A harmless, kind-hearted pervert, Toufukuji is often willing to sacrifice his own safety and freedom to help Hibiki; or otherwise satisfy his craving for upskirts. He is good friends with Mori Kouji.
name: Toufukuji Toufuu
